title: No plugin system for custom rules
description: Users can't add custom rule checkers without modifying source code. RuleEngine only reads YAML. Create a plugin system: 1) Define RulePlugin protocol with evaluate() method, 2) Auto-discover plugins in ~/.code-atlas/plugins/, 3) Allow registering via config. Example plugin: check for TODO comments, check for specific import patterns. This greatly extends tool utility.

title: Query API should support filters and sorting
description: File: src/code_atlas/query.py. Methods like complex() and top_complex() have hardcoded logic. Users can't filter by file pattern, sort by different fields, or combine queries. Add query builder pattern: CodeIndex.query().filter(file_pattern='src/').complex(>10).sort_by('complexity').limit(20). This makes API much more powerful and composable.
